item.description:
Rome, Amalfi Coast, Capri & Pompeii
Jun 14/23 2011
- 5 NIGHTS IN ROME in a 4 STARS HOTEL BY THE SPANISH STEPS
- 3 NIGHTS IN AMALFI COAST IN A 4 STARS HOTEL BY THE BEACH
- DAILY BREAKFAST
- DINNER IN A ROMAN SPECIALTIES RESTAURANT
- VISIT OF ROME
- WELCOME COCKTAIL PARTY IN AMALFI COAST
- PIZZA & GELATO NIGHT IN AMALFI COAST
- PRIVATE TRANSPORTATION
- VISIT OF CAPRI ISLAND BY BOAT
- VISIT OF AMALFI COAST - RAVELLO & AMALFI
- VISIT OF POMPEII
- PROFESSIONAL TOUR-GUIDES in POMPEII & ROME
- BILINGUAL TOUR MANAGER, MY SELF, ELSA GRAMOLA

For more info contact:
Elsa Gramola - A Taste of Italy in Austin
Italy Tours | Italian Language | Cooking Classes
www.ATasteOfItalyInAustin.com

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: TOUR OF ROME, AMALFI COAST, CAPRI ISLAND AND POMPEII
